title: SITMOD Gaming Chairs for Adults with Footrest-Computer Ergonomic Video Game Chair-Backrest and Seat Height Adjustable Swivel Task Chair with Lumbar Support(Gray)-Fabric
descriptions:
Introducing the SITMOD Gaming Chairs for Adults with Footrest-Computer Ergonomic Video Game Chair! This chair is specifically designed to provide maximum comfort and support while gaming or working. 

Featuring a stylish Gray color and made with high-quality Fabric material, this chair is not only comfortable but also durable. The overall dimensions are 23 inches wide, 20 inches deep, and can be adjusted in height from 49 inches to 52 inches. The seat is 20.5 inches wide and 20.8 inches deep, while the back measures 22 inches in width and 32.6 inches in height. The chair also offers a height adjustment of 3.2 inches, ensuring a perfect fit for any user.

With a weight capacity of up to 300 lbs, this chair is suitable for users of various sizes. The ergonomic design ensures proper body alignment and reduces discomfort during long gaming or work sessions. The chair can swivel 360 degrees, allowing for easy movement and flexibility. It also has a recline feature with a range of 90 to 150 degrees, allowing you to find the perfect angle for relaxation or intense gaming.

The footrest is retractable, providing additional support and comfort for your legs. The armrests are upholstered and designed to provide maximum comfort. The lumbar support is adjustable, allowing you to customize the chair to your specific needs. The chair also comes with adjustable pillows for added support.

Safety is a top priority with this chair. It is equipped with a SGS certified 4-level cylinder for stability and durability. 

The SITMOD Gaming Chairs for Adults with Footrest-Computer Ergonomic Video Game Chair is perfect for gaming enthusiasts and office workers alike. It is easy to assemble and comes with a satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied, you can return it with no questions asked. Parts replacement is also available if needed.

Don't miss out on the ultimate gaming and working experience. Get your SITMOD Gaming Chair today!
